admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
trustfund:
TF023794-SJF-JAPAN-AGRICULTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF021391-HEALTH CARE & SOCIAL
            INSURANCE PROJECT,TF031160-HUNGARY - HEALTH SECTOR

abstracts.cdata!:
The Pensions Administration and Health
            Insurance Project provides technical assistance,
            fellowships, training, preparation of studies, computer
            hardware and software, equipment, teaching materials,
            limited civil works and refurbishment of facilities, and
            incremental recurrent costs. Special attention will be given
            to issues of long-term financial sustainability and
            efficiency. The project consists of the following two
            components: 1) management development and planning,
            comprising project management, systems planning and
            organization, planning development unit, and preinvestment
            studies; and 2) operational infrastructure, comprising
            application software and technology infrastructure.
